ENTRY.refkeywords: set pha pha2 phaII spectrum spectra

DESC.PARA: The set_data command establishes a dataset from a Sherpa data object.

LIST.ITEM: id - the id of the dataset to use; if not given, uses the default dataset id (id=1 by default, see "ahelp get_default_id")
data - a dataset, e.g. created by unpack_data ("ahelp unpack_data") or unpack_pha ("ahelp unpack_pha")

DESC.PARA: Unpack data from the file "data.filtered", using the default settings, and set it as dataset "filtered".

PHA data is unpacked and set as a dataset. Since the unpack_pha command output is a list - in order to handle Type I and II PHA files - it's necessary to specify which element ("[0]") to provide to set_data.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
